content: this legal text summarizes a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the case involves three heirs who are each responsible for paying 13 of the total costs of 23400 eur the procedure lasted for 1 year and 22 days from january 20 2021 to february 14 2022 the court determined the value of the goods involved to be 843585 eur and set the compensation for damages at 834585 eur the goods will be divided equally among the widower of the deceased the son of the deceased and another son of the deceased the court ruling is based on the inheritance act specifically article 11 the deceased person was a citizen of the republic of slovenia and the estate includes a compensation amount based on damages caused by a specific event or situation the widower and two sons are the intestate heirs and will each receive an equal share of onethird of the inheritance the heirs have filed a petition to open succession proceedings and have accepted the inheritance since there is no movable property left by the deceased a probate hearing is not required the court fee assessed is 24300 eur payable by the heirs the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal which must be done within 15 days of receiving the written decision the appeal should be submitted to the court with copies for all parties involved the ljubljana high court will decide on the appeal the notice of appeal must include a statement of the decision being appealed whether it is being challenged in whole or in part and the grounds for the appeal the appeal should contain all necessary information and be clear otherwise it may be dismissed if the appeal is lodged by a proxy the proxy must be a lawyer who has passed the state examination in law the court fee must be paid when lodging the appeal and if not paid on time the appeal will be considered withdrawn the appeal is considered lodged on time if sent by registered post on the last day of the appeal period the text is dated february 14 2022 in ljubljana
